Restoring the Factory Default Settings

Use the System Management > Factory Default page to clear all of your configuration information and restore the router to its factory default settings. Only use this feature if you wish to discard all the settings and preferences that you have configured.

  1. Click Return to Factory Default Setting if you want to restore the router to its factory default settings.
  2. When the confirmation message appears, click OK to continue. If you do not want to restore the factory default settings, click Cancel.
